response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $14,000. This offer allows you to secure a valuable asset at a price that is higher than its intrinsic value to you ($12,000) while still ensuring a fair return for me. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 14000}
